pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:0.2_0: The account of the nun Analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:0.5_0: The training rule on teaching pointless knowledge
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns from the group of six do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun points out pointless knowledge, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.2_0: At that time the nuns from the group of six were learning pointless knowledge.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.3_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.4_0: “How can the nuns teach pointless knowledge? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.7_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six do this?” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, those nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.13_0: if she teaches verses for the purpose of protection;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.15_0: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.16_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on tenth rule, is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.17_0: The fifth sub-chapter on pleasure houses is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.6_0: Whatever outsider has been used up by exterior?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.8_0: if she teaches by the line, then for every line she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.9_0: If he instructs by the syllable, then for every syllable he commits an offense entailing confession.
